text: He-Man is a character from the Masters of the Universe media franchise. He-Man may also refer to: ==Animation== *He-Man and the Masters of the Universe, 1983-1985 animated series *He-Man & She-Ra: A Christmas Special, 1985 animation special *The New Adventures of He-Man, 1990 animated series *He-Man and the Masters of the Universe (2002 TV series), revival of the 1980s animated series ==Video games== *He-Man: Power of Grayskull, 2003 role-playing video game for the Game Boy Advance *He-Man: Defender of Grayskull, 2005 multi-platform action-adventure game ==Films== *Masters of the Universe (film), 1987 American film starring Dolph Lundgren as He-Man *He-Man (film), 2011 Chinese film, completely unrelated to the comic character ==See also== *He (disambiguation) *Man (disambiguation) *Heman (disambiguation) *Masters of the Universe (disambiguation) *Machismo *She-Man (film)
title: He-Man (disambiguation)
